title: Shield of Cthulhu
summaries: The Shield of Cthulhu is an Expert Mode shield accessory obtained from the Treasure Bag dropped by the Eye of Cthulhu. Equipping it allows the player to perform a dash attack by double-tapping either the ◀ Left or ▶ Right key. Dashing into an enemy deals 30 damage, and grants momentary invincibility.

statistics.Tooltip:
Allows the player to dash into the enemy
Double tap a direction
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
